DOC.brief_summary: Investing the Timed Up and Go (TUG) Test in Hemiplegic Patients Using 3D Motion Analysis
DOC.brief_title: Time Up and go in Hemiplegic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The timed up and go is a routine quick test assessing motor functional tasks including stand up ,walk 3 m,turn around and sitting down.We will included hemiplegic patients to quantify biomechanic parameters
